biocontainers.name: quake
biocontainers.summary: Quake is a package to correct substitution sequencing errors in experiments with deep coverage (e.g. >15X), specifically intended for Illumina sequencing reads

biotools.summary: A program for detecting and correcting errors in next generation sequencing reads.

bioschemas.name: Quake
bioschemas.summary: A program for detecting and correcting errors in next generation sequencing reads.
